text:
@realDonaldTrump Don the Con is bragging about the markets today. 

He failed to mention that the Dow was over 29,000 before he totally screwed up the Covid-19 response crashing the market and the economy. But sure, Don, brag about the 14% loss as if it's a mark of your presidency, because it is.
